desc: Marketing has changed. You need to too. Learn how in Shift | A Marketing Rethink. Buy now @ Shiftbyphd.com. Featuring insights from Unilever, Volkswagen Group, Audi, Diageo, HSBC, and 1,700 marketers.

layout.text: Read PHD's latest book, Shift, to learn how to get ahead of marketing change and to stop just responding to it.
